name: Turbo City Smash 3D
description:
City racing has never been more action packed. Super realistic sport car controls with fun 3D graphics. Smash up and crash into everything you can to score points. It includes racing in the city streets and even some countryside roads. Features amazing , addictive gameplay and high speed action. Race through crowded streets, smash into traffic. This game will challenge even the most crazy racing fans.

GAMEPLAY
- One Touch steering with auto turbo and drifting
- Realistic physics for ultra fast driving
- Score points by smashing into cars, trucks, people, police, and other objects.
- 8 Missions to complete per level to advance to the next


KEY FEATURES
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Smooth and realistic car handling
- 3 different super cars to choose from
- 4 maps to explore: city, warehouse, city night, and countryside
